Description.Title: EvapoTranspiration (EnergyBalance strategy, SiriusQuality2)
Description.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson; Glen S. Francis; Derick R. Wilson; Robert J. Martin
Description.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
Description.ExtendedDescription: This strategy computes daily evapotranspiration by selecting between two methods depending on data availability. If wind and vapour pressure are available (isWindVpDefined = 1), it uses the Penman approach; otherwise it uses the Priestley–Taylor method. Inputs are the pre-computed Priestley–Taylor ET (r.evapoTranspirationPriestlyTaylor) and Penman ET (r.evapoTranspirationPenman), and the output is the selected evapotranspiration (r.evapoTranspiration). The component is part of the SiriusQuality2 EnergyBalance module.
Description.ShortDescription: Chooses Penman or Priestley–Taylor evapotranspiration based on data availability.

Input.name: isWindVpDefined
Input.description: Indicator (1 or 0) whether wind and vapour pressure are defined (1 -> use Penman, 0 -> use Priestly-Taylor).

Output.name: evapoTranspiration
Output.description: Selected evapotranspiration rate based on data availability.

Function.name: Estimate
Function.description: Main biophysical process function for EvapoTranspiration.

Function.name: CalculateModel
Function.description: Supporting function implementing the evapotranspiration selection logic.
